column1: Local Foods////This place is very good. I have been a few times now
column2: and i don't know whether i like the sandwiches or their side items better. I have had a few different sandwiches here and the one that stands out the most is the bahn mi. It was very tasty. Less impressive was the crunchy chicken
column3: which was dry and rather bland. Each time i come i am more and more impressed by their side options. Their Kale salad and barley stand out as highlights.
